title: Professor of Pediatrics in Neonatology
department: Department of Pediatrics, Division of Neonatology
research_focus_description: Dr. Maitre's research focuses on the neuroscience of the developing brain, particularly in understanding and aiding brain recovery from early insults. She is passionate about high-risk infant follow-up and combines research with clinical care, implementation science, and advocacy to improve outcomes for infants and children.
